name: nv-dark-ui

3.0.8.name: nv-dark-ui
3.0.8.description: Dark, minimalist UI theme, matches with nv-dark-syntax

fontSize.title: Font Size
fontSize.description: Change the font size for the UI.

tabSizing.title: Tab Sizing
tabSizing.description: In Even mode all tabs will be the same size. Great for quickly closing many tabs. In Maximum mode the tabs will expand to take up the full width. In Minimum mode the tabs will only take as little space as needed and also show longer file names.

tabCloseButton.title: Tab Close Button
tabCloseButton.description: Choose the position of the close button shown in tabs.

hideDockButtons.title: Hide dock toggle buttons
hideDockButtons.description: Note: When hiding the toggle buttons, opening a dock needs to be done by using the keyboard or other alternatives.

readme:
## nv-dark-ui
Forked from one-dark-ui, tweaked by Nicklas Vraa to match nv-dark-syntax.

![nv-dark-syntax](https://github.com/NicklasVraa/nv-dark-ui/blob/master/example.png?raw=true)  
Matching syntax theme: **nv-dark-syntax**  
Visual packages: file-icons, minimap

### Build Log
I will be making more tweaks to increase aesthetic coherance with nv-dark-syntax. I will also be simplifying the code.

tabSizing.description: In Even mode all tabs will be the same size. Great for quickly closing many tabs. In Maximum mode the tabs will expand to take up the full width. In Minimum mode the tabs will only take as little space as needed and also show longer file names.

tabCloseButton.description: Choose the position of the close button shown in tabs.

hideDockButtons.title: Hide dock toggle buttons
hideDockButtons.description: Note: When hiding the toggle buttons, opening a dock needs to be done by using the keyboard or other alternatives.
